___javascript.description: List of glob-style patterns for locating Javascript files reside. These are imported in the order in which they appear.

___ignore.description: List of glob-style patterns for files to ignore. Ignores are applied when searching for Markdown files, Javascript files, and asset files.

___twitter.description: Your Twitter handle that will be shown to players and in OpenGraph cards on Twitter

___linkTooltips.description: If true, show a tooltip on macro links indicating the macro destination. (Useful for dev, but you probably want to disable it for release.)

___template.description: The HTML template file to use for the final story output

___includeBackButton.description: Whether to include a back button in your story.

___outputFormat.description: Options: 'minify' to minify the final story HTML (reduces file size but makes the HTML source much less human-readable), 'prettify' to prettify the final story HTML into human-readable HTML, 'default' for no additional processing

___title.description: The game title that will be shown to players and in OpenGraph cards

___markdown.description: List of glob-style patterns for locating Markdown source files. These are compiled in the order in which they appear.

___description.description: The game description (one or two sentences) that will be shown to players and in OpenGraph cards

___website.description: A web URL that will be shown to players, e.g. your website where players can find more of your work

___output.description: The folder where the final story files will be saved

___smartPunctuation.description: If true, replace straight quotes with smart quotes, -- with en-dash, --- with em-dash, and ... with ellipsis.

___assets.description: List of glob-style patterns for locating additional asset files. These are imported in the order in which they appear.

___backButtonHtml.description: Raw HTML inserted in the place where the back button is defined to be.
